song_lyrics: Tame bhāve bhajī lyo Bhagwān, jīvan thoḍu rahyu;
Kāīk ātmānu karī lyo kalyāṇ, jīvan thoḍu rahyu...
Ene didhel kol te bhulī gayā,
Cheto cheto shu bhulyā chho bhān... jīvan 1
Have bākī chhe temā dhyo dhyān... jīvan 2
lobh vaibhav ne dhan tajāshe nahi;
kāīk ḍar to Prabhujīno dilmā dharo;
E ja kahevu ā dāsnu dilmā dharo,
title: Tame bhāve bhajī lyo Bhagwān

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-583: unknown

Category: Updeshna Pad
